original_text: And, behold, the servants of David and Joab came from pursuing a troop, and brought in a great spoil with them: but Abner was not with David in Hebron; for he had sent him away, and he was gone in peace.
korean_text: 다윗의 신복들과 요압이 적군을 치고 크게 노략한 물건을 가지고 돌아오니 아브넬은 이미 보냄을 받아 평안히 갔고 다윗과 함께 헤브론에 있지 아니한 때라

sentences.original_text: the servants of David and Joab
and brought in a great spoil with them:
but Abner was not with David in Hebron;
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 아브넬은 헤브론에 있는 다윗과 함께하지 않았고;

sentences.original_text: for he had sent him away,
and he was gone in peace.
